body.p: Touch the Digital button in the navigation buttons to display the Digital screen.

The Digital screen displays the Digital Values screen as shown in .
The first column is the description of the digital point valueâ€™s alarm or abnormal state. Their dot indicator at the beginning of each row indicating the general state of point (for explanation of indicator, see ).
The second column describes the status of the alarm or abnormal state listed in the first column.
The third column is the date/time stamp of when the alarm or abnormal state occurred.
